meanings.definition: A genus of extinct proboscideans, related to elephants.
meanings.sent1: The stegodon roamed the ancient lands with its long trunk.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bones of the stegodon to learn more about its history.
meanings.sent3: At the museum, the children were amazed by the huge stegodon skeleton.
meanings.sent4: In stories, the stegodon was often portrayed as a gentle giant of the past.
meanings.sent5: The image of the stegodon's massive tusks stayed in their minds long after the exhibit.

meanings.definition: Any member of the genus Stegodon.
meanings.sent1: The zoo welcomed a new stegodon to their collection of prehistoric animals.
meanings.sent2: Researchers identified the fossil as a stegodon based on its unique features.
meanings.sent3: During the parade, a person dressed as a stegodon waved to the crowd.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the hero rode into battle on the back of a stegodon.
meanings.sent5: The children's book featured a friendly stegodon character that taught valuable lessons.

meanings.definition: The fossil remains of a stegodon.
meanings.sent1: Excavators carefully unearthed the stegodon fossil from the ground.
meanings.sent2: Museums display the stegodon remains to educate visitors about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent3: During the dig, the archaeologists found a nearly complete stegodon skeleton.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of the stegodon bones shed light on ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent5: The paleontologist's eyes widened in excitement as they uncovered the stegodon fossil.
